duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and coordinate on-site construction activities for assigned projects.
Monitor the completion of each construction phase through coordination, scheduling, and inspection of each home.
Ensure quality craftsmanship and customer satisfaction in accordance with Company goals and objectives.
Assist in budgeting time requirements to complete each phase of construction and meet deadlines by scheduling subcontractor work and deliveries.
Review, on a daily basis, the production of homes via inspections during various construction phases to ensure quality control.
Conduct pre-construction and pre-settlement meetings with home buyers; resolve customer service issues and production problems during the construction phase.
Assist in the control of production costs through review and approval of time sheets, production and service invoices, delivery, and inspection sheets.
Serve as the primary contact for trade partners, customers, and internal associates for each home being overseen.
Quickly and proficiently use real data to evaluate a problem and solve it within the organization’s policies and procedures.
Approach each day in a systematic and orderly way.

education_certification.credential: 2+ years of professional construction project management experience
Bachelor’s degree in construction or related field (Preferred, not required)
